name: Suite Novotel Luxembourg

reviews.title: holiday stay
reviews.text: We stayed in the hotel as part of our travelling arrangements down to Italy. The hotel was superbly laid out, the staff friendly, professional and welcoming. We stayed for breakfast and the choice was varied and of excellent quality, We are planning italy again next year and I hope to be able to stay at this hotel again for this, or If as part of my employment I am in Luxembourg I will be booking this hotel

reviews.title: Brand new hotel, design furniture, not too expensive
reviews.text: I stayed at Suite Novotel Luxemburg for five nights in July 2011. It is a brand new hotel and is situated in the financial district of Luxemburg City (very quiet and safe!!).

reviews.title: good.
reviews.text: nice, spacious, clean rooms. Not easy to find and a poor breakfast for €12,-.

reviews.title: Fine once we found it
reviews.text: Found the hotel easily enough, but discovering where to park (there were building works going on at the time) was not easy. As we checked in (having left the car in the Sofitel car park) we were told that we could park in the Novotel car park, which was convenient - and I don't recall being charged. The hotel is away from the City Centre, but the walk takes about 15 minutes. The Suitehotel/ Suite Novotel concept is one that not all guests will like. I quite like it - a spacious room with a double bed and a sofa bed with a fridge and microwave in the room. The wifi was free and worked perectly well. The hotel was not cheap, but the staff were pleasant and the bed was comfortable. Breakfast was a slightly curious affair, but overall the stay was good.

reviews.title: Room for improvement
reviews.text: I stayed here for one night only in May 2011. The name of the hotel is 'Suite Novotel' but if you are expecting a high quality suite style service, you will be very disappointed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Brand new hotel in a complex of 3 Mercure owned hotels. Our room was an apartment with separate kitchen/lounge and we loved it.
reviews.title: WOW!!

reviews.text: The fittings are new and modern with the shower room separate from the WC.The room has free wifi and free movie channels on the tv. Free parking outside too
reviews.title: Short stay
We'll stay here again!
reviews.text: My husband and I went to Luxembourg for a long weekend and this hotel offered a very good deal for three nights - only 78 Euros per night. The room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. The toilet was separated from a huge shower and a nice bath tub. TV had some English channels. They also offered movies and internet for free! Breakfast was interesting. They come in small plastic tubs. Although they were very tasty, I didn't appreciate how environmentally unfriendly they were! That's the only complaint from me. If we visit Luxembourg again, we'll definitely stay here again.

reviews.title: Good but can be better
reviews.text: This hotel is just next to Novotel Kirchberg. It's pretty new - the parking is not yet finished but you can use it. It's not possible to go to the hotel or the parking from the main road (JFKennedy); you need to go from the back side.

reviews.title: Some concern
reviews.text: The breakfast doesn't offer warm meals...only small bread & small portions...but i guess that's their concept. The suite rooms are pretty nice & their weekend package offer for free movies is really nice.

reviews.title: Cool new place in Kirchberg
reviews.text: I would recommend this place for those with cars since it's far from the city center. It's also perfect for those working in the EU quarter since it's just close by.

reviews.title: Good value
reviews.text: A telephone message addressed to me was not forwarded to my room and not even incerted in an inbox at the counter.

aka: Suite Novotel Luxembourg Hotel Luxembourg City
